text: I ve just had a chat with a collague about 100% efficient protocols to keep fluo protein alive (tdTomato) after solvent-based clearing..and apparently vDISCO is working; uDISCO worked (but with a crazy variability that we haven`t yet understood) and with ECi with never had good results (for fluo protein preservation); however,  I haven`t tried vDISCO personally. Any other feedback is welcome!
